name: LightCondensed.comp_val

decl:

name: LightCondensed.hom_ext_iff
initialProofState:
C : Type w
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, w} C
X Y : LightCondensed C
f g : Quiver.Hom X Y
‚ä¢ Iff (Eq f g) (‚àÄ (S : Opposite LightProfinite), Eq (f.val.app S) (g.val.app S))
decl:
@[ext]
lemma hom_ext {X Y : LightCondensed.{u} C} (f g : X ‚ü∂ Y) (h : ‚àÄ S, f.val.app S = g.val.app S) :
    f = g := by
  apply Sheaf.hom_ext
  ext
  exact h _

name: LightCondSet.hom_naturality_apply
initialProofState:
X Y : LightCondSet
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
S T : Opposite LightProfinite
g : Quiver.Hom S T
x : X.val.obj S
‚ä¢ Eq (f.val.app T (X.val.map g x)) (Y.val.map g (f.val.app S x))
decl:
@[simp]
lemma hom_naturality_apply {X Y : LightCondSet.{u}} (f : X ‚ü∂ Y) {S T : LightProfinite·µí·µñ}
    (g : S ‚ü∂ T) (x : X.val.obj S) : f.val.app T (X.val.map g x) = Y.val.map g (f.val.app S x) :=
  NatTrans.naturality_apply f.val g x
